0.title: Data you gave us
0.content: Check the data you provided us with when signing up for the service.

1.title: Data we collect
1.content: Learn about the data we collect and analyze while you're using our service.

2.title: What you agreed
2.content: Terms and conditions and privacy policies you dutifully agreed.

delete-dialog.title: Delete data
delete-dialog.text: Your data will be deleted. The controller will be notified about your request and will respond to it shortly.

email-address.label: Email adress
email-address.get: Required for logging into Finder and to send you notifications about places nearby.

profile.label: Profile
profile.get: You retrieve personalized recommendations that fit to you.
profile.share: We build a profile based on how you use Finder, what sparked your interest, and which places you visited.

current-location.label: Current location
current-location.get: Your current position is used to identify places nearby.
current-location.share: Your current location is obtained either via GPS, WiFi, or based on the cell tower your phone is connected to.

location-history.label: Location history
location-history.get: You retrieve personalized recommendations that fit to you.
location-history.share: Your location history is used to enrich your interest profile with additional data.

browsing-history.label: Browsing activity
browsing-history.get: You retrieve personalized recommendations that fit to you.
browsing-history.share: Your browsing history is used to enrich your interest profile with additional data.

index.step-0-title: Welcome to the Finder Privacy Dashboard
index.step-0: You can always return to this page by clicking the Home button!
index.step-1: Review the data you provided us when signing up for Finder.
index.step-2: Learn about Finder GmbH and companies involved in providing Finder.
index.step-3: Explore the data we collected, when you used Finder.
index.step-4: Learn what you agreed with when accepting the terns and conditions.
index.step-5: You can change the language of the dashboard.

profile.step-0: Your data is grouped into multiple categories.
profile.step-1: Click the little arrow to take a closer look on a certain category.

about.step-0: A controller is a company that processes your personal data. In this case us: Finder GmbH. There can be multiple controllers.
about.step-1: A processor is a company that processes your personal data on behalf of the controller(s).
about.step-2: Click the little arrow to take a closer look on a certain company.

data.step-0: Your data is grouped into multiple categories.
data.step-1: You can inspect each category individually.
data.step-2: Click the little arrow to take a closer look on a certain category.
data.step-3: To delete some data, just click the bin icon next to the data. The controller will be notified to delete the data permanently.

permission.step-0: See your personal data you agreed us using to use Finder.
permission.step-1: See how much you're sharing with us.
permission.step-2: Learn more about the types of personal data you share with us...
permission.step-3: ... and what you get in return.
